definition: oath/pledge/union/to ally/league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: Experts in the U.S. and allied governments find these denials hard to believe.
sentences.chinese: 美国及其同盟国的专家觉得这些声明不值得相信。

sentences.english: Philippines Senator Aquilino Pimentel says ASEAN countries also are in a position to help.
sentences.chinese: 菲律宾参议员皮门特尔说，东盟国家也可以提供帮助。

sentences.english: China and Pakistan are close diplomatic allies.
sentences.chinese: 中国和巴基斯坦系外交关系密切的同盟国。

sentences.english: It is illegal to display a confederate flag on a courthouse.
sentences.chinese: 在法院屋顶悬挂盟国国旗是违法的。

sentences.english: ASEAN countries have been important locations of FDI from Japan in Asia-Pacific region.
sentences.chinese: 日本与东盟国家有着历史的和现实的密切关系。

sentences.english: AI will not call in allies during the early parts of a limited war.
sentences.chinese: 人工智能盟国不会在过程中调用有限战争初期部分。

sentences.english: Profound changes have taken place in both China and ASEAN countries.
sentences.chinese: 中国和东盟国家都发生了沧海巨变。

sentences.english: The Nazi dispositions against the European supply lines of the United Nations were now complete.
sentences.chinese: 纳粹已经完成了对盟国的欧洲补给线的封锁。

sentences.english: In recent years, China and ASEAN countries have made vigorous efforts to implement the DOC.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，中国和东盟国家积极推进落实宣言。

sentences.english: Some NATO allies remain anxious about cooperating with Russia on missile defense.
sentences.chinese: 某些北约盟国对与俄罗斯进行反导合作感到担心。

sentences.english: In fact, many states rely on “nuclear umbrellas” provided by their allied nuclear-armed states.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，许多国家依靠其有核盟国提供“核保护伞”。

sentences.english: Counter-force and counter-value targets in the United States and the territory of its allies.
sentences.chinese: 反力和反价值目标在美国和其盟国的领土。

sentences.english: The United States and its allies are right to balance values and strategic interests.
sentences.chinese: 美国及其盟国积极去平衡价值观和战略利益才是正道。

sentences.english: Allies launch successful counter-offensives at the Marne and Amiens.
sentences.chinese: 盟国发射成功反攻在马恩和亚眠。

sentences.english: When any large operation is undertaken, it is usually a surprise attack against an ally .
sentences.chinese: 凡要采取大规模的行动时，总对盟国进行突然袭击。

sentences.english: Key allies in the war on terror are not spared either.
sentences.chinese: 反恐联盟的主要盟国也不消停。

definition: NATO/abbr. for 北大西洋公約組織|北大西洋公约组织[Bei3 Da4 xi1 Yang2 Gong1 yue1 Zu3 zhi1], North Atlantic Treaty Organization
Allies/entente (i.e. Western powers allied to China in WW1)

pinyin: Bei3 Da4 xi1 Yang2 Gong1 yue1 Zu3 zhi1
